caption:
This photograph captures a close-up portrait of an older man wearing a wide-brimmed straw hat. His features reflect an experienced and weathered expression. He has distinct facial wrinkles and a mature, thoughtful gaze. The man's dark eyes are slightly downcast, and his thick, age-grayed eyebrows add to his expressive face. A cigarette hangs from his lips, unlit.

He is wearing what appears to be a light-colored, possibly white jacket over a collared shirt. The background of the image is softly blurred, focusing attention solely on the man. The predominant color in the background is a deep red, which contrasts with the lighter, earthy tones of the man's hat and clothes. The composition of the photograph, with the man slightly off-center, enhances the intimate and candid feel of the portrait, suggesting a moment of quiet reflection or a brief pause in his day.
title: Ranch hand who works in the area near Leakey, Texas, near San Antonio
